chapters.name: Components of Food
learning_outcomes: Identifies major nutrients in food items.
Understands the importance of a balanced diet.

chapters.name: Sorting Materials into Groups
learning_outcomes: Classifies materials based on their properties.
Differentiates between soluble and insoluble substances.

chapters.name: Separation of Substances
key_topics: Methods of separation: handpicking, threshing, winnowing, sieving
learning_outcomes: Selects appropriate methods for separating mixtures.
Explains the process of obtaining salt from sea water.

chapters.name: Getting to Know Plants
key_topics: Parts of a plant: stem, leaf, root, flower
Structure and function of flower parts
learning_outcomes: Identifies different types of plants.
Labels parts of a plant and explains their functions.

chapters.name: Body Movements
key_topics: Joints: ball and socket, pivotal, hinge, fixed
Gait of animals (earthworm, snail, cockroach, birds, fish, snakes)
learning_outcomes: Identifies different types of joints in the human body.
Describes how different animals move.

chapters.name: The Living Organisms â€” Characteristics and Habitats
learning_outcomes: Lists characteristics of living organisms.
Relates adaptations of animals to their habitats.

chapters.name: Motion and Measurement of Distances
learning_outcomes: Measures length using standard units.
Differentiates between different types of motion.

chapters.name: Light, Shadows and Reflections
learning_outcomes: Explains how shadows are formed.
Distinguishes between shadow and image.

chapters.name: Electricity and Circuits
learning_outcomes: Constructs a simple electric circuit.
Classifies materials as conductors and insulators.

chapters.name: Fun with Magnets
learning_outcomes: Identifies magnetic and non-magnetic materials.
Uses a magnet to find directions.

chapters.name: Air Around Us
learning_outcomes: Lists the components of air.
Explains the importance of air for living beings.
